question: Sebutkan 15 regular verb dan 15 irregular verb ! Bantuin aku yaa PR nya di kumpul hari ini

answers.answer:
regular
1. abide-abided
2. awake-awaked
3. input-inputed
4. mow-mowed
5. wake-waked
6. help-helped
7. adore-adored
8.  advance-advanced
9.  bellow-bellowed
10. benefit-benefited
11. dare-dared
12. blink-blinked
13. block-blocked
14. create-created
15 .spur-spured

irregular
1. come-came
2. dig-dug
3. deal-dealt
4. drink-drank
5. do-did
6. draw-drew
7. eat-ate
8. fall
9. fell
10. feel-felt
11. fly-flew
12. feed-fed
13. give-gave
14. go went
15.keep-kept

Reguler verbs Abase =abased=abased=merendahkan diri
abash=abashed=abashed=memalukan
abate=abated=abated=berkurang
abbreviate=abbreviated=abbreviated=menyikat
abdicate=abdicated=abdicated=turun tahta
abduct=abducted=abducted=menculik
abhor=abhorred=abhorred=membenci
abolish=abolished=abholished=menghapuskan
abridge=abridged=abridged=menyingkat
absorb=absorbed=absorbed=menyerap

irreguler verbs Abide=abode=abode=berdiam
arise=arose=arisen=terbit
awake=awoke=awaked=bangun
backbite=backbitten=backbitten=mengumpat
backslide=backslid=back=murtad lagi
bear=bare=borne=lahir
beat=beat=beaten=memukul
become=became=become=menjadi
befall=befell=befallen=menimpa
beget=begot=begun=mulai

related_questions.question: Membuat pidato bahasa inggris tentang menjaga kebersihan lingkungan sekolah

answers.answer:
Assalamualaikum wr wb.
and good afternoon
The Honourable mothers and fathers who are present in this place
      first of all I would like say thank to the Almighty God who has given us a good healt so we can join in this nice place.
      The second time, do not forget I said thank to the our Prophet Muhammad Saw had brought us from the realm of darkness into the lightness
In addition, I would like say thank to the audience for allowing me to deliver my speech with the theme of keeping the environment clean
well, my beloved brothers and sisters
     Keeping the environment clean is a way and the actions we can do to be able to obtain the beauty and the beauty of the environment, other than that if we always keep the environment around us, our environment will be maintained and healthy so that we can all farthest from various diseases.
A healthy environment would be more fun and comfortable to live in the neighborhood of a dirty  filled with garbage strewn everywhere.
My beloved brothers and Sisters
     We have seen so many benefits that can be obtained if we keep the environment clean, therefore we as a society that cares about the environment, let us together to preserve the environment around us to look comfortable and cool in the view
and always a pleasant environment.My beloved Brothers and Sisters
    So what can I say, if there are sentences that are less pleasing to you, I apologize, because there is no ivory that is not going to crack and there would be no human beings make mistakes.
thank you for your attention and wasalamualaikum wr wb.

related_questions.question:
Berikan ciri-ciri hewan berikut dalam bahasa inggris. (1 hewan minimal 5 ciri-ciri/physical appearance)    1. Elephant
2. Lion
3. Tiger
5. Cow
6. Goat
7. Cat
8. Pinguin
9. Chicken
10. Dog

answers.answer:
Elephant : has a great body, has a proboscis, has ivory, gray colored, big legs and oval
Lion : brown, have fangs, claws, have thick hair on approximately heads, have 4 legs
Tiger : There Orain colored striped stripes on the body, have fangs, claws, have long collapsed, has 4 legs
Cat : berwarna coklat, abu abu, hitam, putih, memiliki taring, memiliki cakar, memiliki tubuh kecil panjang sepeti cita, memiliki 4 kaki, memiliki rambut di sekitar tubuh
Chicken : has feathers, has beak, has 2 legs, have wings, has a comb

elephant :has a trunk,four legs,
lion:has a sharp teeth ,four legs,
tiger:has a black line in his body,has a sharp teeth
cow:eat grass,four legs ,have dots,making milk
goat:eat grass 
cat:have a mustache,four legs,has a paws
pinguin:has a soft and many fur,can swim,can life in cool place
chicken:has two legs,has a fur,cannot fly,has a wings
dog:has a mustache ,has four legs,eats meat

related_questions.question:
1. If you want to make meatballs, where do you go to buy meat?    a. drugstore
b. fashions store
c. butcher
d. chemist
2. A person who sells flowers is a ....
a. gardener
b. farmer
c. florist
d. pianist
3. Mrs. Rudolf likes to make a research of ancient mummy in Egypt. She is ....
a. archeologist
b. carpenter
c. linguist
d. judge
4. A person who cheers the kids in a party and wears funny make up is called ....
a. librarian
b. cop
c. nurse
d. clown
5. Mr. Davidson carves the wood to make a mask. He makes earn living from carving. He is ....
a. sculptor
b. bricklayer
c. farmer
d. barber

answers.answer:
1. c. butcher
2. c. florist
3. a. archeologist
4. d. clown
5. a. sculptor
Menurut saya itu :)

answers.answer:
Description of horse

Horse is one of mamalia. Horse have a four legs. Horse have a even tooth. Horse has long tail. Horse have unique characteristic is horse can’t see so if a cabman riding horse, the horse must wear a glasses so that the horse can walk smooth. The horse eat grass. The horse have a brown skin,  and the horse have little hair in head. That’s all about my description about horse.   Description of horse Horse is one of mamalia. Horse have a four legs. The horse eat grass. The horse have a brown skin,  and the horse have little hair in head.

That’s all about my description about horse.
A horse is a gentle,loving and loyal animal. The animal is a mammal. Horses can have many different coats than other. They have : hooves,and tail. not all horses gentle.  Many are not at gentle.

maaf cuman bisa bantu itu

related_questions.question: Buatkan 5 kalimat either or dan 5 kalimat neither nor!

answers.answer:
kalimat either
1. Either Tommy or Tommy’s friends are going to visit me tonight. 
2. Either Jenny or Juli has seen the Madagascar.
3. Either the father or the mother has to attend the meeting.
4. Either John or Peter received your message.
5. Either Peter or the girls need to attend the course.

kalimat neither nor:
1. Neither Tommy nor Tommy’s friends are going to visit me tonight.
2. Neither Yayat nor two of his friends are attending the class now.
3. Neither I nor my daughter has seen the Frozen.
4. Neither Sarah nor Peter was to blame for the mistake.
5. Neither Frank nor Lilly lives in Eugene.

related_questions.question: Apa saja sifat-sifat hewan dalam bahasa inggris ?
10 peringatan di tempat umum dalam bahasa inggris dan maknanya

answers.answer:
Don't park = dilarang parkir
Don't stop = dilarang berhenti
Don't turn right = dilarang belok kanan
Don't turn left = dilarang belok kiri
no smoking = dilarang merokok
Keep silent = diam

dilarang berhenti : prohibited stopped
dilarang parkir : parking is prohibited
dilarang belok kiri : prohibited left turn
dilarang belok kanan : prohibited left right turn
hati-hati : caution
tikungan ke kanan : bend to the right
tikungan ke kiri : bend to the left
tanjakan : incline
tikungan tajam ke kiri : sharp bend to the left 
tikungan tajam ke kanan : sharp bend to the right
